org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.parquet.protobuf

Class ParquetProtobufDataSink

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.parquet.protobuf.ParquetProtobufDataSink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataSink
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TemporalParquetProtobufDataSink

    public class ParquetProtobufDataSink
extends Object
implements DataSink
    A graph data sink for parquet-protobuf files.
